languages.text: {n}Скучающий друкари навостряется и, склонив голову набок, смотрит на Иокасту.{/n} "А она занятная, {name}. Одолжи мне ее поиграть после того, как разберешься со своей ущемленной гордостью. Нам явно найдется что... обсудить".

{n}Marazhai drops his bored expression and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."
languages.original_text: {n}Скучающий друкари навостряется и, склонив голову набок, смотрит на Иокасту.{/n} "А она занятная, {name}. Одолжи мне ее поиграть после того, как разберешься со своей ущемленной гордостью. Нам явно найдется что... обсудить".

traits.locale_text: {n}The bored Drukhari pouts and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."

{n}The bored Drukhari pouts and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."

{n}Marazhai drops his bored expression and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."

{n}Marazhai drops his bored expression and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."

{n}Marazhai drops his bored expression and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai agacha la mirada y gira la cabeza a un lado para mirar a Sauerback.{/n} «Me resulta interesante, {name}. Permítame jugar con ella cuando haya terminado de recuperar su orgullo. Parece que tenemos ciertos elementos comunes que... explorar».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai drops his bored expression and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai agacha la mirada y gira la cabeza a un lado para mirar a Sauerback.{/n} «Me resulta interesante, {name}. Permítame jugar con ella cuando haya terminado de recuperar su orgullo. Parece que tenemos ciertos elementos comunes que... explorar».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは退屈そうな表情を崩し、首を傾げてザウアーバックを見た。{/n}「これは面白い、{name}。あなたの傷ついたプライドをどうにかしたら、彼女を私に貸してくれ。私たちには『探求』しなければならない、共通点があるようだ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai drops his bored expression and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは退屈そうな表情を崩し、首を傾げてザウアーバックを見た。{/n}「これは面白い、{name}。あなたの傷ついたプライドをどうにかしたら、彼女を私に貸してくれ。私たちには『探求』しなければならない、共通点があるようだ…」

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋脸上无聊的表情消失了。他歪着头，看着苏尔贝克。{/n}“这个人很有意思，{name}。等你的面子问题解决之后，把这个人借给我玩玩吧。我觉得，我和她之间有些共同点……可以探索。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai drops his bored expression and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋脸上无聊的表情消失了。他歪着头，看着苏尔贝克。{/n}“这个人很有意思，{name}。等你的面子问题解决之后，把这个人借给我玩玩吧。我觉得，我和她之间有些共同点……可以探索。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gibt seine gelangweilte Miene auf richtet seinen Blick auf Sauerback.{/n} "Eine interessante Frau, {name}. Lasst mich ein wenig mit ihr spielen, nachdem Ihr Euren verletzten Stolz behandelt habt. Mir scheint, wir haben einige ... Gemeinsamkeiten."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai drops his bored expression and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gibt seine gelangweilte Miene auf richtet seinen Blick auf Sauerback.{/n} "Eine interessante Frau, {name}. Lasst mich ein wenig mit ihr spielen, nachdem Ihr Euren verletzten Stolz behandelt habt. Mir scheint, wir haben einige ... Gemeinsamkeiten."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, qui se départit rarement de son expression ennuyée, penche la tête sur le côté d'un air intéressé en observant Sauerback.{/n} « Cette femme m'intrigue, {name}. Une fois que vous aurez soigné votre orgueil blessé, prêtez-la-moi. Il semblerait que nous ayons des points communs à… explorer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai drops his bored expression and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, qui se départit rarement de son expression ennuyée, penche la tête sur le côté d'un air intéressé en observant Sauerback.{/n} « Cette femme m'intrigue, {name}. Une fois que vous aurez soigné votre orgueil blessé, prêtez-la-moi. Il semblerait que nous ayons des points communs à… explorer. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzündeki bezgin ifade yok oluyor. Başını yana eğerek Sauerback'e bakıyor.{/n} "Bu kadın çok ilgimi çekti {name}. Yaralanan gururunu iyileştirdikten sonra onu bana ödünç ver de oyuncağım yapayım. Görünüşe göre... Keşfedebileceğimiz ortak zevklerimiz mevcut."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai drops his bored expression and tilts his head to the side, looking at Sauerback.{/n} "This one is intriguing, {name}. Lend her to me to play with after you have dealt with your wounded pride. It seems we have some common ground to... explore."
